# optionsGroups

**Instance Property**

An array of options group objects to customize how the system shares the collaboration.

## Declaration

```swift
var optionsGroups: [SWCollaborationOptionsGroup] { get set }
```

## Accessing options attributes

- **summary**: A localized string to summarize the collaboration options.

items.description: A localized string to summarize the collaboration options.
items.name: summary
